alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:55AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Muscogee, Chattahoochee and Harris Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 853 AM EDT, National Weather Service indicated and media reported strong gusty winds developing behind a storm system along a line extending from near Baughs Crossroads to near Providence Canyon State Park. HAZARD...Strong gusty winds. SOURCE...Media reported. IMPACT...Strong winds have developed behind a storm system. Expect an increased potential for downed trees and powerlines, along with blowing around of unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Hamilton, Cusseta, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Upatoi, Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Jamestown/south Fort Benning, Renfroe and Rose Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
